description: Main source file for the Flutter front-end of a WikiGraph converter application. It defines the app's theme, main widget, and a screen for user input to send Wikipedia URLs to a backend server for conversion.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget setting the application's theme and home screen.

classes.name: _ConverterScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget hosting the URL input form and status display.

methods.name: ColorScheme _oceanProfessionalScheme
methods.description: Builds a custom color scheme based on Brightness.

methods.name: _validateUrl
methods.description: Validates that a URL uses HTTPS and contains 'wikipedia.org' in host.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles form submission, sends HTTP POST request to backend, and updates UI based on response.
